nagena samaja wiruddhathwaya, gambauru wana aarthika arbudayak, yuro mudala bindawatime anathura ha yuropa sangamaya binda wisirimaka tharjanaya hamuwe, jarmanu adhirajyawadaya dewana loka yuddhaye siya yuda aparadha hethuwen owunge yudawadaya matha panawana lada simawan dan pa්rathikshepa karayi. 1914 di ha 1930 gananwaladi men samahan kala nohaki aarthika ha samaja pa්rathiwirodhathawanta muhuna denu laba eya yudawadaya ha yuddhaya desata hari atha.

yuddhayath samaga ape rate jana wargika gata`pawa demala tha්rasthawadaya ha sannaddha bedumwadaya lesin katha kirimatath artha dakwimatath sima karagena athi heyin, demala deshapalana apekshawan gana kathawa aarambha karannema, 1972 janaraja aanduka්rama wyawasthawa magin sinhala bauddha anthawadaya sandaha thahawuru karagath bauddhagama rajya aagama wana, eekiya rajyayak thahawuru kirime siyalu aarakshaka waganthi athulu karamin saha dakune sinhala pa්rajathantha්rawadin illa sitina balaya bedima gana kathawa hanga thaba gena ya.
